prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Bass, Drums, Guitar, Synth Pad, Reed, Piano, Organ, Chromatic Percussion, but without Strings.
captions:
Style 1:

This composition features Bass, Drums, Guitar, Synth Pad, Reed, Piano, Organ, Chromatic Percussion - but no Strings.

Style 2:

This song is comprised of Bass, Drums, Guitar, Synth Pad, Reed, Piano, Organ, Chromatic Percussion - omitting Strings.

Style 3:

This piece is made up of Bass, Drums, Guitar, Synth Pad, Reed
